meanings.definition: A person or company that distills alcoholic beverages.
meanings.sent1: The distillers at the local brewery work hard to create high-quality spirits.
meanings.sent2: The distillers in Scotland are known for producing fine whiskey.
meanings.sent3: The distillers decided to have a friendly competition to see who could make the strongest drink.
meanings.sent4: The distillers were like alchemists, turning simple ingredients into liquid gold.
meanings.sent5: The aroma from the distillers' workshop filled the air with a sweet scent.

meanings.definition: A machine or apparatus used for distilling liquids.
meanings.sent1: The distillers in the laboratory were used to extract pure water from impurities.
meanings.sent2: The copper distillers in the distillery gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The distillers in the factory had a race to see which one could purify the most liquid in an hour.
meanings.sent4: The distillers hummed softly as they separated the essence from the mixture.
meanings.sent5: The old distillers in the museum showcased the evolution of distillation technology.
